subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Bryan McCabe had a goal and an assist during a four-goal second period to lead the Toronto Maple Leafs to an 8-2 victory against the host Boston Bruins on Thursday night.
snippet: Bryan McCabe had a goal and an assist during a four-goal second period to lead the Toronto Maple Leafs to an 8-2 victory against the host Boston Bruins on Thursday night.
